title: Azul CTO: Java at 30 Still Rules Enterprise Dev
author: Darryl K Taft
description: Three decades after its debut, Java continues to dominate enterprise development, weathering countless "killer" technologies and evolving with modern computing trends from AI integration to cloud native innovations.
cntitle: Azul 首席技术官：Java 在 30 岁时仍然主导企业开发
cndescription: Java 问世三十年来，持续在企业开发领域占据主导地位，经受住了无数“杀手级”技术的考验，并随着从 AI 集成到云原生创新等现代计算趋势不断发展。
